nodes.text: Eric Cagle is a freelance game designer and writer who has done work for Wizards of the Coast on the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. His contributions include co-writing several books, adventures, and scenarios for both the d20 Star Wars Roleplaying Game and the Star Wars Saga Edition Roleplaying Game. He has written for several game systems, including Dungeons and Dragons and d20 Modern for Wizards of the Coast, Warhammer Fantasy Roleplaying Game for Green Ronin, Hollow Earth Expedition for Exile Games, and Grimm for Fantasy Flight Games.
Eric lives in Seattle, Washington where the coffee is dark and bitter like his goddesses.
